text: Hey there! Love Coding? Secure Code Warrior is looking for fierce developers that can write clean and good code in Scala Play, C++, Python Django, Ruby on Rails, Angular, Angular Js, Swift, React, Go, Kotlin, for a new REMOTE Project we are just starting. The position is to create small applications for our Training Platform. We are in need of developers with at least 2 years of experience and a good level of English. Are you interested? Send your resume to: earevalo@securecodewarrior.com to Evelyn Ar√©valo. (www.securecodewarrior.com)
